description:
A defensive solution for bug-infested areas that doesn't block your vision or impede close-up tasks.

  • Made of 15-denier mesh that keeps out mosquitos, black flies or no-see-ums
  • Mesh is easy to see through when walking or moving fast
  • Under-the-arm design covers neck and upper chest, so you can open your shirt collar for venting
name: Ben's UltraNet Head Net - Unisex
